layer.name: Skill
layer.definition: The ability to do something well; expertise. Not just doing something, but developing competence — getting better through deliberate practice and feedback.

questions.text: I know what foods work well for my body and what doesn't — I've experimented and have practical knowledge, not just theory.
questions.principle: Nutritional knowledge is personalized through testing

questions.text: I know how to optimize my sleep — I understand my sleep needs and have developed practices that ensure quality rest.
I can prepare healthy meals efficiently — I have practical cooking/meal prep skills, not just good intentions.
questions.principle: Food preparation is a practical skill

questions.text: I know how to create environments that support my work and rest — I've developed practical space management skills.
I can troubleshoot when my energy or recovery is off — I have diagnostic skill for my own body's signals.
